meanings.definition: To use someone's social media account without their permission.
meanings.sent1: She decided to frape her friend's profile as a joke.
meanings.sent2: It is not right to frape someone's account without asking first.
meanings.sent3: The siblings planned to frape each other's accounts for fun.
meanings.sent4: His mischievous nature led him to frape his sister's social media.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of frape can be serious and damaging to relationships.

meanings.definition: A prank involving altering someone's online profile without their knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The frape on his profile made him laugh when he saw it.
meanings.sent2: She fell victim to a hilarious frape that left her surprised.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends pulled off a clever frape on their buddy.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected frape on her account made her day brighter.
meanings.sent5: The frape was so well done that it took a while for him to notice.

meanings.definition: The act of impersonating someone on social media.
meanings.sent1: The frape of her online persona caused confusion among her friends.
meanings.sent2: He was shocked to discover the frape that had been done in his name.
meanings.sent3: The frape of the celebrity's account was all over the news.
meanings.sent4: The clever frape fooled many into thinking it was the real person.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of a frape can be damaging to one's reputation.
